パッケージ ml.peya.plugins.Utils

クラス BookUtil

java.lang.Object
ml.peya.plugins.Utils.BookUtil
public class BookUtil
extends Object
Create a "Virtual" book gui that doesn't require the user to have a book in their hand. Requires ReflectionUtil class. Built for Minecraft 1.9
作成者:
Jed

      public static void openBook​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack i, org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Open a "Virtual" Book ItemStack.
      パラメータ:
      i - Book ItemStack.
      p - Player that will open the book.

    • setPages

      public static void setPages​(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.BookMeta metadata, List<String> pages)
      Set the pages of the book in JSON format.
      パラメータ:
      metadata - BookMeta of the Book ItemStack.
      pages - Each page to be added to the book.
